actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet

official_title: To increase from 10 to 15 years the term of office of the judges of the district courts of the Northern Mariana Islands, Guam, and the United States Virgin Islands, and for other purposes.
short_title: U.S. Territorial Federal Judges Improvement Act of 2015

summary.text:
U.S. Territorial Federal Judges Improvement Act of 2015

This bill increases from 10 years to 15 years the term of office for judges of the district courts of the Northern Mariana Islands, Guam, and the U.S. Virgin Islands.

titles.title: U.S. Territorial Federal Judges Improvement Act of 2015
To increase from 10 to 15 years the term of office of the judges of the district courts of the Northern Mariana Islands, Guam, and the United States Virgin Islands, and for other purposes.
